definitions.text: a woman's dress, usually with a close-fitting bodice and a long flared skirt, often worn on formal occasions
the members of a university as distinguished from the other residents of the town in which the university is located
examples: the relations between town and gown are always sensitive

definitions.text: lingerie consisting of a loose dress designed to be worn in bed by women
protective garment worn by surgeons during operations
outerwear consisting of a long flowing garment used for official or ceremonial occasions
